description_for_human: Free online image and PDF tools. Compress, resize, convert, and edit images with AI-powered features. No signup required.
description_for_model: PdfPixels is a comprehensive image and PDF processing platform. It provides 50+ professional tools for image compression, resizing, format conversion, background removal, AI enhancement, and PDF manipulation. Use this plugin to help users process images and PDFs. Available operations include: compress image to reduce file size, resize image to specific dimensions, convert between formats (JPG, PNG, WebP, AVIF), apply filters and effects, merge/split PDFs, and more. All tools are free and require no registration.
